trans-unit.source: Specifies that a XAML namespace can be subsumed by another XAML namespace.
Typically, the subsuming XAML namespace is indicated in a previously defined <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XmlnsDefinitionAttribute" />.

Applying the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlnsCompatibleWithAttribute> enables an assembly to provide a new and compatible namespace for another XAML namespace, as previously indicated by <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlnsDefinitionAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: Anwenden der <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlnsCompatibleWithAttribute> ermöglicht es eine Assembly zu neuen und kompatiblen Namespace angeben, für einen anderen XAML-Namespace, wie zuvor erkennbar <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlnsDefinitionAttribute>.

trans-unit.source: For example, `"http://www.adatum.com/2003/controls"` could be marked compatible with a defined XAML namespace identified as `"http://www.adatum.com/2005/controls"` through the following assembly-level attributes:
trans-unit.target: Beispielsweise `"http://www.adatum.com/2003/controls"` können mit einem definierten XAML-Namespace identifiziert als kompatibel gekennzeichnet werden `"http://www.adatum.com/2005/controls"` über folgende Attribute auf Assemblyebene:

trans-unit.source: In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase.
trans-unit.target: In früheren Versionen von .NET Framework war diese Klasse in der WPF-spezifischen Assembly WindowsBase.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlnsCompatibleWithAttribute> is in the System.Xaml assembly.
trans-unit.target: In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlnsCompatibleWithAttribute> befindet sich in der System.Xaml-Assembly.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md).
trans-unit.target: Weitere Informationen finden Sie unter [aus WPF zu System.Xaml migrierte Typen](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XmlnsCompatibleWithAttribute" /> class.
Gets the subsuming namespace identifier reported by this attribute.
The subsuming namespace identifier reported in the attribute.
trans-unit.target: Der zusammenfassende Namespacebezeichner, der von diesem Attribut gemeldet wird.

trans-unit.source: Gets the reference namespace identifier reported by this attribute.
